species.name: munkidori
descriptions: Munkidori keeps itself somewhere safe while it toys with its foes, using psychokinesis to induce intense dizziness.
The chain is made from toxins that enhance capabilities. It stimulated Munkidori's brain and caused the Pok√©mon's psychic powers to bloom.
